tool_description: Get similar words in multiple languages. Largest web database @ 35 million synonyms in 26 languages.
name: Thesaurus - Multi Language Synonyms
title: Thesaurus - Multi Language Synonyms

api_list.name: Available Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thesaurus-multi-language-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com/availablelanguages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thesaurus-multi-language-synonyms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
